### Форма пельменей


Здесь можно написать какое-нибудь описание.

```{r, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(lingtypology)
library(leaflet)


df <- read.csv("Пельмени - csv.csv")
df$photo <- paste("<img src='",
                       as.character(df$photo),
                       "'></img>", sep = "")
df
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
map.feature(languages = df$language,
            features = df$form,
            popup = df$photo,
            width = 7,
            title = "Форма пельменей")

```
